name: ASDGamesTanksKO
description:
Multiplayer Game: Tanks KO is a multiplayer game where up to four players can play game together.  

Map Selection: Player can choose terrain (map) they like most.

Health Status: Main goal of Tanks KO is to attack enemies tank and reduce their health and win the game.

Lock and Unlock feature: If one player is attacking then all remaining players will be locked at that time.
